title: Clinical Insights Survey on Effectiveness of Natural Ingredients (Shatavari)

questions.question_text: How frequently do you prescribe or recommend galactagogues to your breastfeeding patients?
options: Very Frequently (More than 5 patients per month)

questions.question_text: For which of the following situations do you most commonly consider galactagogues?
What is your typical first-line approach for managing perceived insufficient milk supply?
options: Reassurance and education on breastfeeding techniques

questions.question_text: Which galactagogues do you commonly recommend or prescribe?
What factors influence your decision to recommend or prescribe a galactagogue?
options: Underlying cause of insufficient milk supply

questions.question_text: How comfortable are you with prescribing or recommending galactagogues?
What is your understanding of the evidence supporting the efficacy of galactagogues?
Have you used Shatavari in your patients with lactation insufficiency?
How would you rate efficacy of Shatavari as a galactagogue?
How do you typically monitor the effectiveness of galactagogues in your patients?
